divs: sighting detailsi was leaving the grocery store with my daughter, and a few seconds later i noticed some strange lights low in the sky that were square looking. i thought it was an airplane at an odd angle. it looked square at first. then,after a few seconds, it never morphed into something familiar, so i kept my eyes on it. i told my daughter to look at it. she too thought it looked very odd. then i noticed that it was not square, nor was it high up like an airplane should be. it was lower. like a little over 10 stories up. (the hospital i work at is ten stories, so i thought of that as a comparison) it was a definate boomerang shaped. my daughter said it looked like a plane with really bent wings. overall it was a v-shape. it had red and yellow lights. not blinking. it was moving slower than a plane or a remote-control plane would move. (i actually thought it might be a remote control plane at first, when i decided it was way too low to be a real plane), but then it was just too big to be anything like any remote control plane that i had ever seen. plus... it was silent. i had slowed down, and was literally hanging out my rolled down window looking up at it. it was traveling perpindicular to the road that i was on. the car behnd me was honking it 's horn... obviuosly not noticing it. i wanted to chase it, but could not turn around to do so because of the traffic. the entire encouter lasted only seconds, but what i noticed was that it was low-flying, and silent. there was no sound. i am familiar with helicopters... sometimes they are landing at the hospital where i work, and even with my windows shut, i can hear them well when they are that high up in the air. this object made no noise. it was traveling at the speed of a car, not an aircraft. it was more like it was floating than flying. the craft was dark against the sky, it was v-shaped, with red and yellow lights all around the perimeter. it was the size of a very small car. larger than a golf cart, but smaller than any small plane. it was something that i could not explain. i've never seen anything in my life that i couldn't put into some kind of category in my mind. this was different. i did notice that the near-by military base was firing off flares that night. they often do that, and i am very familiar with flares and what they look like. this looked like a man-made craft, flying very slow, low, and silent through the night. i wondered if it was some military craft or something. it was flying in a direction away from the base. probably too low to be on any radar. (i think). the object was not doing any fancy maneuvering, it was just flying\floating in a straight line, silently, and i lost site of it, when it went behind my field of vision, over the road. i couldn't turn around. or look at it as it was directly overhead and behind me. then it was lost behind a tree line. my feelings during the whole encouter were matter of fact. i was honestly trying to fit it into some file in my mind, it was only a few minutes later that it kind of struck me as really strange because there was no where to file this event. i've never seen anything to compare.
Summary: low flying boomerang shape size of small car with lights
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around January 15th 2008
